content:
@Mark Kramer @May Terry @Richard Esmond
Since it is never too late to start being organized, I have created some issues in the Applicadia Fhir ig github.
https://github.com/applicadia/Fhir-BreastRadiologyReport/issues

Three new items.
a) we need to add sponsoring group name to footer (from Lynn)
b) we need to add ballot indication (??) to header (from Lynn)
c) We need to set 'Publish Box' value (this may be same as (b)
